T02D3713:104b-1: yo ga aa nutta ra ya tantr'artha aa ba t'a ra sam gra ha n'a ma /

T02D3713:108a-5: phyi dang nang na 'ang snying po yod ma yin //
T02D3713:108a-6: chos rnams thams cad de 'drar shes par gyis //
T02D3713:108a-9: dper na gzhon nu rmi lam nang gnas tshe //
T02D3713:108a-10: des ni bu skyes shi bar gyur pa mthong //
T02D3713:108a-11: skyes pas dga' la shi bas gdung bar 'gyur //
T02D3713:108a-12: chos rnams thams cad de 'drar shes par gyis //
T02D3713:108a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D3713:108a-14: don dam pa'i bden pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3713:108a-15: rnam grangs pa dang rnam grangs ma yin pa'o //
T02D3713:108a-16: de la rnam grangs pa ni ye shes dang /
T02D3713:108a-17: de kho na nyid la dmigs pa'i tshul gsum pa'i rtags las skyes ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D3713:108a-18: rnam grangs ma yin pa ni chos thams cad rang
T02D3713:108a-19: bzhin gyis ma skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis gdod
T02D3713:108a-20: ma nas ma grub pa las dang skye ba thams
T02D3713:108a-22: rnam par rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa spros pa thams cad rnam par chad pa tsam ste /
T02D3713:108a-23: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D3713:108a-24: de yang ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las /
T02D3713:108a-25: don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa bco brgyad de yang dag pa'i mtha'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02D3713:108a-26: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D3713:108a-27: dngos po med pas sgom pa'i dngos //
T02D3713:108a-28: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02D3713:108a-29: de bas dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D3713:108a-30: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D3713:108a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D3713:108a-33: rang sems sems ni dmigs pa las //
T02D3713:108a-34: chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas //
T02D3713:108a-35: nam mkha'i rdo rje gnas sems 'di //
T02D3713:108a-36: chos med chos nyid med pa'o //
T02D3713:108a-38: tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa las /
T02D3713:108a-39: spros pa med cing snang ba med //
T02D3713:108a-40: rnam rtog med cing shin tu phra //
T02D3713:108a-42: mngon par byang chub pa las kyang /
T02D3713:108a-43: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D3713:108a-44: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D3713:108a-45: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa ni //
T02D3713:108a-46: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D3713:108b-1: glang po mtshan bcings kyi mdo las kyang /
T02D3713:108b-2: gang gis skye ba 'byung ba ni //
T02D3713:108b-3: dngos po gang la 'ang rnyeng mi 'gyur //
T02D3713:108b-4: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo la //
T02D3713:108b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan las kyang /
T02D3713:108b-8: rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3713:108b-9: chos rnams kun kyang bde bar gshegs dang 'dra //
T02D3713:108b-10: byis ba'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa yis //
T02D3713:108b-11: 'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod //
T02D3713:108b-13: theg pa chen po nyi shu pa las kyang /
T02D3713:108b-14: gang tshe sgyu mkhan sgyu ma ni //
T02D3713:108b-15: spangs shing nye bar bsdus pa na //
T02D3713:108b-16: de tshe ci yang mi snang ste //
T02D3713:108b-17: de ni chos kyi chos nyid do //
T02D3713:108b-19: byang chub kyi sems bshad pa las kyang /
T02D3713:108b-20: rtogs pa po yis rtogs bya gang //
T02D3713:108b-21: shes bya med pas shes pa med //
T02D3713:108b-22: de ltar shes dang shes bya gang //
T02D3713:108b-23: dngos po med par cis mi 'dod //
T02D3713:108b-24: rtogs bya rtogs byed rnam par sems //
T02D3713:108b-25: de bzhin gshegs pas ma gzigs so //
T02D3713:108b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa gzhung sna tshogs las gsungs pa yin no //
T02D3713:108b-27: de lta bas na de kho na mthong bar 'dod
T02D3713:108b-28: pa rnams kyis khong du chud cing rtogs par bya
T02D3713:108b-29: ba'i yul thams cad ni bden pa gnyis su 'dus
T02D3713:108b-31: de yang bden pa gnyis rnam par bstan pa las /
T02D3713:108b-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
T02D3713:108b-33: bden pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
T02D3713:108b-34: 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang //
T02D3713:108b-35: dam pa'i don gyi bden pa'o//
T02D3713:108b-37: de ltar bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid rtogs na
T02D3713:108b-38: 'bras bu sku gsum gyi rang bzhin la mngon par
T02D3713:108b-39: 'dod pa 'byung bas thams cad mkhyen pa yon tan
T02D3713:108b-40: gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa bden pa gnyis kyi
T02D3713:108b-41: rang bzhin can bde ba chen po'i rnam pa chos
T02D3713:108b-43: bde ba chen po'i sku zhes rnal 'byor chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' las 'dod do //
T02D3713:108b-45: rnal 'byor chen po'i bshad pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3713:108b-46: dbang phyug brgyad kyis bcom ldan 'das //
T02D3713:108b-47: bde ba chen po'i gnas na bzhugs //
T02D3713:109a-2: sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa //
T02D3713:109a-3: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs //
T02D3713:109a-4: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D3713:109a-5: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya /
T02D3713:109a-7: gzhan yang bshad pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3713:109a-8: yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas /
T02D3713:109a-9: sems can thams cad rig 'gyur zhing //
T02D3713:109a-10: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par //
T02D3713:109a-11: bdag nyid ye shes lus kyi rgyu //
T02D3713:109a-12: gtso bo gang du rgyu ba yi //
T02D3713:109a-13: de yi khyim ni nam mkha' nyid //
T02D3713:109a-14: bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D3713:109a-15: de nyid du ni rtag tu dgyes //
T02D3713:109a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D3713:109a-20: khams gsum pa ni ma lus kun //
T02D3713:109a-21: de yi nye bar longs spyod nyid //
T02D3713:109a-24: lha dang mi yi bde ba ni //
T02D3713:109a-25: bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi ;
T02D3713:109a-26: / bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D3713:109a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D3713:109a-28: de kho na nyid rin po che snang ba las kyang /
T02D3713:109a-29: longs spyod rdzogs pa kha sbyor bde chen rang bzhin med //
T02D3713:109a-30: snying rjes nges gang rgyun mi 'chad pa 'gog pa med //
T02D3713:109a-31: yan lag bdun po nyid dang ldan pa'i bsgrub bya 'di //
T02D3713:109a-32: tshad mar yongs bsgos blo yis sngags pa bdag nyid 'dod //
T02D3713:109a-35: chos sku bde ba chen po ni //
T02D3713:109a-36: sku gnyis la ni khyab par gnas //
T02D3713:109a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D3713:109a-38: de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni chos kyi
T02D3713:109a-39: sku dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i dbang
T02D3713:109a-40: gis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D3713:109a-41: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par brgyan pa snang bar gyur pa yin no //
T02D3713:109a-42: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02D3713:109a-43: thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku las //
T02D3713:109a-44: slar yang longs spyod rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02D3713:109a-46: de ni 'og min du dbang phyug chen bo'i gnas
T02D3713:109a-47: zho'i spri lta bur gyur pa snying bo byang chub
T02D3713:109a-48: tu mngon par byang chub pa bstan nas byang chub
T02D3713:109a-49: sems dpa' chen pos bcu pa rnams la chos kyi
T02D3713:109a-50: longs spyod par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D3713:109a-52: 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs med du //
T02D3713:109b-0: @109b sangs rgyas rnam par 'tshang mi rgya //
T02D3713:109b-1: gzugs kyi khams kyi 'og min du //
T02D3713:109b-4: gzhan yang chos kyi sku dang /
T02D3713:109b-5: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni byin gyi rlabs las
T02D3713:109b-6: byung ba sprul pa'i skus kyang 'dod pa'i khams su
T02D3713:109b-7: sangs rgyas pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba dang rjes su
T02D3713:109b-8: mthun par sku bstan pa yin no //
T02D3713:109b-10: gtsang ma'i gnas ni rnam spangs nas //
T02D3713:109b-11: 'og min gnas ni nyams dga' bar //
T02D3713:109b-12: yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
T02D3713:109b-13: sgrub pa po dag 'dir sangs rgyas //
T02D3713:109b-15: sprul pa'i skus kyang 'khor ba ji srid ma stongs
T02D3713:109b-16: kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par
T02D3713:109b-17: gdul bya rnams kyi mos pa dang /
T02D3713:109b-18: skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sprul sku 'dra ba dang /
T02D3713:109b-23: mi rtag pas don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D3713:109b-24: de yang ji skad du rdo rje dra ba las /
T02D3713:109b-25: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D3713:109b-27: de dang de yi gzugs kyis ni //
T02D3713:109b-28: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02D3713:109b-30: de ltar na sku gsum gyis lam thams cad kyi 'bras bur gyur pa bsdus pa yin te /
T02D3713:109b-31: bdag dan gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rab kyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3713:109b-33: lus dang ngag sems rnam dag pas //
T02D3713:109b-34: sku gsum du ni bstan pa yin //
T02D3713:109b-36: de ltar bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid shes shing
T02D3713:109b-37: 'bras bu sku gsum gyi spyi'i rang bzhin rtogs na
T02D3713:109b-38: de la mngon par 'dun cing de'i thob pa'i thabs
T02D3713:109b-40: de bas na de'i rgyur gyur pa ni sngags kyi lam rnam pa gnyis su 'dod de /
T02D3713:109b-41: smin par byed pa'i lam dang /
T02D3713:109b-42: grol bar byed pa'i lam mo //
T02D3713:109b-43: smin par byed pa'i lam la yang bzhi ste /
T02D3713:109b-44: bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D3713:109b-45: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D3713:109b-46: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D3713:109b-48: de yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D3713:110a-2: bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste //
T02D3713:110a-3: gsang ba'i dbang bskur gnyis pa yin //
T02D3713:110a-4: shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste //
T02D3713:110a-5: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02D3713:110a-8: dbang bskur ba la gsum du 'byed //
T02D3713:110a-9: ces gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D3713:110a-11: shes rab ye shes te gsum yin no //
T02D3713:110a-13: bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa las /
T02D3713:110a-14: chu dang cod pan rdo rje bdag po dang //
T02D3713:110a-15: ming zhes btags dang bum pa zhes bya ba //
T02D3713:110a-16: gsang ba dang ni shes rab ye shes te //
T02D3713:110a-17: dbang bskur rnam pa gsum du shes par bya //
T02D3713:110a-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed cing dam tshig dang dbang
T02D3713:110a-21: bskur ba thob par ma gyur pas ni de kho
T02D3713:110a-22: na nyid 'ba' zhig tsam la 'bad cing phyin ci
T02D3713:110a-23: ma log par bsgrubs kyang 'bras bu mchog 'dod pa
T02D3713:110a-26: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing //
T02D3713:110a-27: dbang bskur thob par ma gyur dang //
T02D3713:110a-28: gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes la //
T02D3713:110a-29: bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo //
T02D3713:110a-31: de ltar dbang bskur zhing yongs su smin par byas
T02D3713:110a-32: kyang sgrub pa po grol bar byed pa byang chub
T02D3713:110a-33: kyi sems 'phel bar byed pa'i snod du ma gyur
T02D3713:110a-34: na 'dod pa bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung bar mi
T02D3713:110a-35: 'gyur ro // de bas na dad pa dang /
T02D3713:110a-39: sngom pa la sogs pa nges par bsten par bya'o //
T02D3713:110a-40: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02D3713:110a-41: byang chub sems bskyed gyur nas ni //
T02D3713:110a-42: lha gzhan la ni mi mos par //
T02D3713:110a-43: gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang //
T02D3713:110a-44: chang dang brdzun ni rnam par spangs //
T02D3713:110a-45: khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni //
T02D3713:110a-46: rig sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya //
T02D3713:110a-47: gal te de rab tu byung na //
T02D3713:110a-48: sngom pa gsum la gnas par bya //
T02D3713:110a-49: so sor thar dang byang chub sems //
T02D3713:110a-53: byang chub sems ni ma bskyed cing //
T02D3713:110a-54: gang gis bka' stsol mi nyan dang //
T02D3713:110a-55: the tshom yod pa nyid dang ni //
T02D3713:110a-56: ma dad pas ni mi 'grub po //
T02D3713:110b-1: gzhan yang sgyu 'phrul du dra ba las /
T02D3713:110b-2: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D3713:110b-3: bzod ldan drang la g-yo sgyu med //
T02D3713:110b-4: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba dang //
T02D3713:110b-5: de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes //
T02D3713:110b-6: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas //
T02D3713:110b-7: 'di ni slob dpon yin zhes bya //
T02D3713:110b-8: de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams //
T02D3713:110b-10: ces gsungs pas na slob ma'ang yon tan de lta bu'am /
T02D3713:110b-11: cung zad dman pas gsol ba btab na /
T02D3713:110b-12: thar rgyal 'dod pas bstan par bya'i //
T02D3713:110b-13: gzhan du slob dpon slob ma dag / gnyis ka nyams pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D3713:110b-15: gshin rje nag po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D3713:110b-16: brtan zhing dul la snying rje gcig bu sems //
T02D3713:110b-17: dad ldan lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa 'dzin //
T02D3713:110b-18: slob ma bla ma la ni gus pa dang //
T02D3713:110b-19: dad pas gshin rje gshed la gus pa dang //
T02D3713:110b-20: brtul zhugs ldan zhing yongs su smin pa yin //
T02D3713:110b-22: de lta bas na lung dang man ngag ji lta
T02D3713:110b-23: ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba'i don la the
T02D3713:110b-24: tshom rnam par bsal te 'jug par bya ba'i sgra
T02D3713:110b-25: ji bzhin pa la brten nas rang dgar gyur pas
T02D3713:110b-26: srog gcod pa la sogs pa bsten pas ni 'bras
T02D3713:110b-27: bu mtho ris kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur na thar
T02D3713:110b-28: pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02D3713:110b-29: bdag dang gzhan la phan par 'dod pa rnams kyis
T02D3713:110b-30: lung gi don la gus pa tsam gyis 'jug par
T02D3713:110b-31: mi bya'o // de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa lung bstan pa las /
T02D3713:110b-32: gsang ba'i bdag po don rgyas pa'i //
T02D3713:110b-33: tshul chen 'di ni rnyed gyur nas //
T02D3713:110b-34: ji bzhin don ni rnyed bzung na //
T02D3713:110b-35: des na lam ngan dag tu ltung //
T02D3713:110b-38: gang gis phung stsogs dngos med par //
T02D3713:110b-39: zhi gnas las byung sems kyis bya //
T02D3713:110b-40: de ni srog gcod bya ba ste //
T02D3713:110b-41: theg pa mchog la gnas ba yin //
T02D3713:110b-42: nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dag / brten 'byung gnyis su ston pa yin //
T02D3713:110b-43: de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste //
T02D3713:110b-44: gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor la //
T02D3713:110b-45: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang //
T02D3713:110b-46: de ni rdzas su shes bya ste //
T02D3713:110b-47: de 'phrog dang tshul gang yin pa //
T02D3713:111a-2: de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba //
T02D3713:111a-3: sems can de ni 'dod la dga' //
T02D3713:111a-4: sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur //
T02D3713:111a-6: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa las kyang /
T02D3713:111a-7: 'khar sil chos gos lhung bzed dang //
T02D3713:111a-8: chu tshags sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis //
T02D3713:111a-9: yan lag lung bzhin mi spong ste //
T02D3713:111a-10: lung ma rtogs par rnal 'byor par //
T02D3713:111a-11: sangs rgyas mu stegs can du 'gyur //
T02D3713:111a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D3713:111a-13: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3713:111a-14: rdo rje theg par khas 'che zhing //
T02D3713:111a-15: mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par //
T02D3713:111a-16: gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing //
T02D3713:111a-17: thug thub dag tu spyad byas na //
T02D3713:111a-18: dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur //
T02D3713:111a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D3713:111a-20: de lta bas na dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob cing /
T02D3713:111a-21: snying rje chen pos rgyud brlan pa //
T02D3713:111a-22: mchog gi byang chub kyi sems la gnas shing /
T02D3713:111a-23: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag shes pa /
T02D3713:111a-24: de kho na'i don la brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang
T02D3713:111a-25: ldan pa rnams ni theg pa chen po 'di'i snod
T02D3713:111a-26: yin no // de yang ji skad du /
T02D3713:111a-27: dgos pa sgrub la mkhas rnams sran thub pas //
T02D3713:111a-28: dka' ba rnams kyang dga' ba med par dga' //
T02D3713:111a-30: de ltar yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pas
T02D3713:111a-31: ni grol lam ste rnal 'byor la mngon par brtson
T02D3713:111a-32: par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gegs su gyur
T02D3713:111a-33: pa rnams par g-yeng ba sna tshogs bdud kyi spyod
T02D3713:111a-34: yul gyis yid mgu ba rnams kyis ni tshogs pa
T02D3713:111a-35: tsam bsags par 'gyur gyis mchog gi dngos grub la
T02D3713:111a-36: sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung bar
T02D3713:111a-37: mi 'gyur ro // de yang bzhi brgya lnga bcu pa las /
T02D3713:111a-38: thos pa tsam gyis sangs mi rgya //
T02D3713:111a-39: 'jug tsam gyis kyang ma yin te //
T02D3713:111a-40: ji srid bsams par gyur pa dang //
T02D3713:111a-44: de ltar rtogs pa'i snying rjer ldan pa'i bdag / ye shes bsam yas skad cig gis bsgrubs pa //
T02D3713:111a-45: dpal ldan kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02D3713:111a-46: ngo bo su zhig nges par sgom mi byed //
T02D3713:111b-0: @111b sdong po brgyan pa las kyang /
T02D3713:111b-1: yang dag sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di //
T02D3713:111b-2: thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub po //
T02D3713:111b-3: la la stobs med chu klung gis //
T02D3713:111b-4: nan gyis khyer bar gyur pa dag / sgom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin //

T02D3713:114b-42: sems las rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung //
T02D3713:114b-45: gang zag ji tsam yon tan chung bas kyang //
T02D3713:114b-46: lhag pa'i bsam pas bskul nas byang chub 'thob //
T02D3713:114b-49: 'chag pa'am yang na ci dgar gnas //
T02D3713:114b-50: dgod pa'am rab tu smra ba'am //
T02D3713:115a-2: rang lhar sbyor ba'i bdag nyid can //
T02D3713:115a-5: bsod nams chung ba'ang sangs rgyas mchod //
T02D3713:115a-6: bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D3713:115a-9: bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas ring zhig lon //
T02D3713:115a-10: rgyal sras dam chos 'dzin pa rnams kyang dus kyis mi snang 'gyur //
T02D3713:115a-11: snyigs ma'i dus kyi tha mar gyur pas sde snod phal cher nub //
T02D3713:115a-12: des na dman pa'i 'jig rten 'di ni skyabs med dmus long bzhin //
T02D3713:115a-13: dmyal ba lta bur sdug bsngal gyur kyang 'khrul pas bde bar 'dzin //
T02D3713:115a-14: yi dgas lta bur 'byor pas phongs kyang phun sum tshogs par sems //
T02D3713:115a-15: dud 'gro lta bur rmongs par 'gyur kyang blo yis mngon par dregs //
T02D3713:115a-16: lus srog rlung bzhin g-yo bar mthong yang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med //
T02D3713:115a-17: de ltar bstan pa nyam chung 'khrul zhing mi lus thob pa'i tshe //
T02D3713:115a-18: dka' ba'i dus su phrad pas bsgrubs na 'bras bu mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D3713:115a-19: 'gro kun bde gshegs snying po yod pas bdag gzhan phan pa'i phyir //
T02D3713:115a-20: don la brten nas dus dang sbyar te sgrub la brtson par bya'o //
T02D3713:115a-21: zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin theg pa mchog don la //
T02D3713:115a-22: mos pa yod kyang rmongs sdig mi dge'i grogs bcas kyis //
T02D3713:115a-23: spang dang blang ba'i rang bzhin mngon par mi rtogs pas //
T02D3713:115a-24: dang po'i las can rnams la rnam bsdus don du 'gyur //
T02D3713:115a-25: gang dag dbang po dman zhing thos pas phongs pa dang //
T02D3713:115a-26: rnal 'byor don thos pas phyongs pa dang //
T02D3713:115a-27: rnal 'byor don la brtson pas rgyas bshad yul min dang //
T02D3713:115a-28: mi shes log par rtog dang the tshom bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D3713:115a-29: mdor bsdus 'di ni bdag gis dri med lung bzhin bris //
T02D3713:115a-30: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi don la
T02D3713:115a-31: 'jug pa bsdus pa slob dpon shraddh'a ka ra wrmas
T02D3713:115a-35: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a kar warma dang /
